bakery.name: Vanilla Bean Custard Danish
bakery.description: Sugar-layered croissant dough filled with a rich and velvety vanilla bean custard––each piece handcrafted with a signature look and baked to a golden finish.

bakery.name: Baked Apple Croissant
bakery.description: Layers of croissant dough wrapped around a warm apple filling, topped with sugar and baked to a golden finish.

bakery.name: Ham & Swiss Croissant
bakery.description: Hickory-smoked ham and melted Swiss cheese wrapped in a butter croissant with soft, flaky layers and a golden-brown crust.

bakery.name: Butter Croissant
bakery.description: Classic butter croissant with soft, flaky layers and a golden-brown crust.

bakery.name: Chocolate Croissant
bakery.description: Two generous pieces of chocolate wrapped in a butter croissant with soft, flaky layers and a golden-brown crust.

bakery.name: Cheese Danish
bakery.description: Flaky, butter croissant dough with soft, warm cheese in the center.

bakery.name: Turkey Sage Danish
bakery.description: Savory turkey sausage lightly tossed in a creamy béchamel sauce, encased in a crisp, flaky laminated pastry.

bakery.name: Banana, Walnut & Pecan Loaf
bakery.description: Bananas, walnuts and pecans mixed into a moist, nutty, classic banana bread.

bakery.name: Iced Lemon Loaf
bakery.description: Citrusy, buttery, moist lemon pound cake topped with a sweet icing.

bakery.name: Pumpkin & Pepita Loaf
bakery.description: Gently spiced pumpkin bread topped with crunchy pepitas.

bakery.name: Cinnamon Coffee Cake
bakery.description: Buttery, moist, coffee cake swirled with a cinnamon-sugar blend and finished with a crunchy streusel topping.

bakery.name: Blueberry Streusel Muffin
bakery.description: A golden-brown muffin with juicy blueberries and notes of vanilla, finished with a cinnamon-streusel topping.

bakery.name: Double Chocolate Brownie
bakery.description: Rich chocolate brownie with generous chunks of semisweet chocolate.

bakery.name: Petite Vanilla Bean Scone
bakery.description: Moist, fluffy, petite scone made with real vanilla beans and vanilla extract.

bakery.name: Plain Bagel
bakery.description: Classic soft, chewy and thick New York–style bagel. Available with cream cheese or butter.

bakery.name: Everything Bagel
bakery.description: Soft, chewy and thick New York–style bagel topped with onion, garlic, salt, poppy and sesame seeds. Available with cream cheese or butter.

bakery.name: Avocado Spread
bakery.description: Avocadoes mixed with lime, sea salt, garlic and a touch of spice—specially packaged to maintain freshness without the use of heat, additives or preservatives.
